summary: A normal fresh year highschool kid found his daily basis life extremely boring, until one day he met a dog and the owner of it that leads him to a completely new life filled with passion within musical stuff.

keywords: rock festival|man's best friend|electric guitar|based on manga|based on comic book
title: Beck
